title: Sao House
description: Sao House is a Vietnamese coffee house anchored by an original narrative universe. The space bridges traditional Vietnamese coffee culture with Salt Lake City's creative community, creating a living world where story, culture, and community intersect, offering both daily neighborhood connection and unique evening experiences that expand the Sao House mythology.
details: Leading development of revolutionary creative retail location integrating cutting-edge AI and immersive technologies. Building comprehensive design system from ground up while managing integrated content pipeline for marketing and animated production. Currently in active development with planned launch in end of 2026.
